devdoc.details: Subscribable adds the functionality to subscribe to a contract

isSubscribed(address).details: public view function to check if a given user is subscribed to the contract

params._userAddress: the address of the user to check

isSubscribed(address).return: true if _userAddress is subscribed to the contract
